gw.plugin

Interface InitializablePlugin

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISolrMessageTransportPlugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEmailMessageTransport, com.guidewire.pl.plugin.document.internal.BaseDocumentProductionDispatcher, BFOMergeHandler, DocumentProductionDispatcher

    public interface InitializablePlugin
    Initialization interface for a plugin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ROOT_DIR
      Parameter name for the path of the plugin's root directory.
      static java.lang.String TEMP_DIR
      Parameter name for the path of the plugin's temp directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setParameters(java.util.Map params)
      Parameters for the plugin, includes directories and parameters defined in config.xml.

    • Field Detail

      • ROOT_DIR

        static final java.lang.String ROOT_DIR
        Parameter name for the path of the plugin's root directory. The root directory is where the plugin can find its property files or any other non-class files it needs. Typically this directory is read-only depending on the security constraints of your web container. A trailing slash will be removed from the dir name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TEMP_DIR

        static final java.lang.String TEMP_DIR
        Parameter name for the path of the plugin's temp directory. The temp directory can be used for writing files. A trailing slash will be removed from the dir name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setParameters

        void setParameters(java.util.Map params)
        Parameters for the plugin, includes directories and parameters defined in config.xml.
        Parameters:
        params - Map of parameters by name
